pageContent:
Career Overview 
● Improved product development velocity by 2–3x by integrating AI-assisted 
development tools such as ChatGPT, Claude, Cursor, and AWS Bedrock, accelerating 
prototyping, debugging, and delivery. 
● Over 9 years of experience as a Full Stack Developer, with deep expertise in Node.js, 
Python, React, and AngularJS. 
● Proficient in the entire software development lifecycle—from requirements gathering 
and system design to development, UAT, and deployment. 
● Built and integrated RESTful APIs with industry-standard platforms to power web apps, 
mobile apps, and ERP systems. 
● Responsible for end-to-end delivery of backend systems, including design, 
development, deployment, and support of scalable microservices. 
● Founding engineer / first employee at three startups—Carbynetech, Focuslabs, and 
Lyssin—with hands-on responsibility for early product development, infrastructure, and 
team setup.

● Founding engineer / first employee at three startups—Carbynetech, Focuslabs, and 
Lyssin—with hands-on responsibility for early product development, infrastructure, and 
team setup. 
● Strong experience with AWS cloud services, including Lambda, S3, DynamoDB, and 
Bedrock for integrating GenAI capabilities like Claude 3 Sonnet into production 
systems. 
● Experienced in AI/ML pipeline design, including prompt engineering, content 
classification, sentiment analysis, and moderation logic. 
● Skilled in Agile/Scrum methodologies, contributing to sprint planning, daily stand-ups, 
retrospectives, and technical mentoring.

Core Technologies 
● Languages: Javascript, HTML/HTML5, CSS, CSS3, Node.js, Python, React 
JS, AngularJS, C# (ASP.NET Framework 4.8, ASP.NET) 
● Database: MySQL, SQLite, DynamoDB, PostgreSQL, Pouch DB 
 
 
Industrial & IoT Technologies 
● Communication Protocols: MQTT, JSON-based APIs, WebSocket, SSL/TLS 
certificate management 
● Real-time Systems: Custom protocol implementation, industrial 
communication standards 
● IoT Integration: Device management, real-time tracking systems, sensor 
data processing 
Visualization & UI/UX 
● Data Visualization: D3.js, Chart.js, real-time dashboard development 
● Mobile Development: Cross-platform mobile apps (Ionic, Cordova), ASP.NET 
mobile development 
● UI/UX Standards: Industrial interface design principles, human-machine interface 
(HMI) best practices 
AI/ML & Cloud 
● AI/ML Tools: AWS Bedrock, Claude 3 Sonnet, Prompt Engineering, Content 
Moderation Pipelines 
● Cloud Services: AWS (Lambda, S3, CloudWatch, EventBridge, Bedrock),

AI/ML & Cloud 
● AI/ML Tools: AWS Bedrock, Claude 3 Sonnet, Prompt Engineering, Content 
Moderation Pipelines 
● Cloud Services: AWS (Lambda, S3, CloudWatch, EventBridge, Bedrock), 
Azure, Firebase, IBM Cloudant, Heroku

Professional Experience:   
 
Company: Lyssin 
Position: Senior Engineering – MERN Stack 
Duration: October 2024 – Present 
● Led architecture and development of an AI-powered feedback analysis system 
using AWS Bedrock (Claude 3 Sonnet) for natural language processing, content 
classification, and automated response generation. 
● Designed a modular AI pipeline with dedicated components for sentiment analysis, 
theme extraction, and executive summary generation—processing 1000+ feedback 
submissions daily. 
● Built an intelligent content moderation system with configurable thresholds for 
detecting violence, spam, and inappropriate content. 
● Implemented robust error handling and retry logic to improve AI service reliability, 
achieving 99.9% system uptime. 
● Established engineering standards for AI integration, prompt engineering, logging, and 
monitoring. 
● Delivered core product modules including user role management, feedback 
workflows, and invite/onboarding flows.

monitoring. 
● Delivered core product modules including user role management, feedback 
workflows, and invite/onboarding flows. 
● Set up secure AWS infrastructure including Lambda functions, S3 buckets, wildcard 
SSL, and CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions. 
● Collaborated cross-functionally to shape the product roadmap, prioritize features, and 
drive business impact. 
● Actively mentored engineers, reviewed code, and helped define engineering best 
practices. 
 
Stack: 
 Node.js, React.js, PostgreSQL, Docker, AWS (Lambda, S3, CloudWatch, EventBridge), AWS 
Bedrock, Claude 3 Sonnet, AI/ML Pipeline Architecture, Content Classification, Sentiment 
Analysis, Microservices Architecture, GitHub, Linear

Company: OpenEnvoy 
Position: Senior full stack developer 
Duration: March 2022 – May 2024 
Description: 
● Developed and maintained a customer-facing web application using Node.js and React. 
● Collaborated with stakeholders to design and implement the interface, incorporating 
feedback to meet user needs and business goals. 
● Created automation scripts in Django to streamline data loading processes and reduce 
manual data entry tasks. 
 
 
Front-End: React JS, Typescript 
Backend:   Node.js, Python, Ruby 
Cloud:        AWS - S3,Lambda 
Database:  PostgresQL 
 
 
 
Company: Focus Labs (Nov 2018 – March 2022)  
  
Description: We have built a driver tracking solution for a US based real-estate firm and middle 
east country for a FMCG firm.  
● Admin can create a route using google maps in an interactive web app and respective 
routes can be assigned to the driver.  
● System will create a route plan based on location and distance for a given month.

routes can be assigned to the driver.  
● System will create a route plan based on location and distance for a given month. 
● The app tracks trip coordinates covered by the drivers to verify the visit to places 
allocated
.  
● Tracking agents live locations, trip executions and report of execution 
Key- Features: 
● Developed admin portal where admin users can create new drivers, new route, assign 
route to driver and periodically check the trips which are assigned to the drivers 
● Simulating driver covered locations in a web app. Admin can validate if all locations are 
covered by the driver.

● Calculating optimized route based on list of address with constraints 
● Sales report for management. 
 
Front-End: AngularJS, Google maps API Integration 
Backend:   Node.js, gulp 
Cloud:        AWS - S3,Lambda and Heroku for CI/CD pipelines and deployment 
Database:  MySQL 
 
Photomagic – Face recognition based photo delivery platform:  
Photomagic is a face recognition-based app at wedding venues which will identify all the 
photos in which a guest is figured from his selfie. A guest need not sift through 1000s of 
photographs to check where he is present. We sift through the collection and collate the 
photos that might interest him. 
Key- Features: 
 
● Machines are getting as better as human beings at recognizing the faces 
● Enabled photographers on this platform to send list of photos to their guests where 
they are present
 
● Guest photographs in an event automatically placed in his/her inbox. Feels like 
magic! Almost.
 
 
Framework:   AngularJS

Cloud:            AWS & Heroku. 
Serverless:    AWS Lambda

Carbynetech (May 2014 – July 2018) 
Key Projects: 
1. Field Sales Order – Tablet App 
○ Developed a mobile app enabling real-time SAP integration for creating/modifying 
sales orders. 
○ Offline support with fast search functionality using indexing and tokenization. 
○ Utilized Ionic Framework, Cordova, AngularJS; Backend: Node.js; Cloud: Azure, 
Heroku; Database: SQLite. 
2. Incident Management System – Hybrid Mobile App 
○ Created a system to track incidents with integration to AWS S3 for storage and 
third-party services for escalations. 
○ Technologies: Ionic Framework, AngularJS, Node.js, Splunk DB, AWS. 
3. Ports Management System – Hybrid Mobile App 
○ Built a system to track coal consignments using advanced search functionality. 
○ Technologies: Ionic, Angular-Material, Node.js, Splunk DB. 
4. MyValueDesk – Freelance Platform 
○ Front-end developer for a freelance platform in SAP, working with ASP.NET MVC, 
JavaScript, and MSSQL.

4. MyValueDesk – Freelance Platform 
○ Front-end developer for a freelance platform in SAP, working with ASP.NET MVC, 
JavaScript, and MSSQL. 
○ Involved in design, mockups, and development. 
5. IoT Implementation Tracker 
○ Developed a web portal for tracking IoT projects, interfacing with SharePoint for 
task management. 
○ Technologies: Angular-material, HTML5, CSS3, SharePoint API. 
Skills: 
● Languages & Frameworks: Node.js, AngularJS, ASP.NET MVC, JavaScript, HTML5, 
CSS3, Ionic, Cordova. 
● Cloud & Databases: Azure, AWS, Heroku, SQLite, Splunk DB, Microsoft SQL. 
● Other Tools: SharePoint API, AJAX, HTTP, Cordova Plugins.

Education: 
 
Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in Computer Science and Engineering 
NRI Institute of Technology (May 2010 - June 2014) 
 
Interests:  
● Health Care: Build tools and web applications to improve better monitoring of health on a 
large scale and provide suggestions with cost effectiveness
